42 
Ontological Engineering 
Slide 42 
Ontological Resource Reuse Process 
Ontological 
Resource 
Reuse 
is 
defined as the process of using 
available 
ontological 
resources 
(ontologies, modules, statements) in 
the solution of different problems.
